package.name: orocos_kdl
package.description:
The 'orocos_kdl' package is deprecated and is being replaced by the 'kdl' package starting in ROS Hydromedusa. The only difference between these two packages is the name.
This is the Kinematics and Dynamics Library (KDL), distributed by the Orocos Project.
package.author: Ruben Smits
Erwin Aertbelien

export.deprecated: The 'orocos_kdl' package is deprecated and is being replaced by the 'kdl' package starting in ROS Hydromedusa. The only difference between these two packages is the name.
